title: Almost got asked out by a girl today (at AT)
content:
Okay so this was actually kind of weird.

I'm just standing there at the end of the Baskin robbins stall, minding my business, when this older girl ‚Äî like, clearly a senior ‚Äî comes up and starts talking to me out of nowhere. At first I thought she maybe needed directions or lost her friends or something. Nope. She was trying to chat. Like, actually chat.

She starts asking me what year I'm in, and immediately I‚Äôm like‚Ä¶ red flag? Why does that even matter? I tell her I‚Äôm a first year, thinking that would kind of end the convo, and she just got all awkward and dipped.

Which‚Ä¶ honestly, thank you?

Super weird energy overall. Felt like I was getting interviewed for something I did not sign up for. 10/10 would not recommend. Not sticking for longer time from next event onwards.

comments.body: I use it to balance out all the dark thoughts i have
This is a good one. I'll be using this to whoever asks me the same :)
Using brightness as a coping mechanism is wild.
I don't know is this a post just in response to the other one or an actual post. What's the likelihood that both of them use reddit
